wikipedia_page.main: Gregor Rioch (born 24 June 1975) is an English former professional footballer. Rioch has been a UEFA A licence coach since the age of 23 and became the  holder of the prestigious UEFA Pro Licence coaching award in July 2011. He is currently the academy manager of Wigan Athletic. His father is former Scotland International and Arsenal F.C manager Bruce Rioch.

response: Dann joined Walsall in 2003 as a junior after impressing on trial at the Bescot Stadium, signing a professional contract with the Saddlers the following year. He moved up the ranks at Walsall to become a regular in the reserve team throughout 2004–05 and was allowed to join Danish side Køge BK on loan towards the end of the campaign, where he played twice under Gregor Rioch.
